CustomField.formula: IF(Opportunity.CloseDate < DATE(2015, 11, 25), (ROUND( IF(AND(ISBLANK(Base_de_Calculo__c),ISBLANK(Tasas__c)), UnitPrice ,IF( ISBLANK(Base_de_Calculo__c),UnitPrice * (1- IF( ISBLANK(Tasas__c), 0, Tasas__c/100)),(UnitPrice * (1- IF( ISBLANK(Tasas__c), 0, Tasas__c/100)) +(UnitPrice * IF( ISBLANK(Tasas__c), 0, Tasas__c/100) * (1 - Base_de_Calculo__c/100 ))))) * VALUE(PricebookEntry.Product2.CANTIDAD_SUB_UNIDAD__c) ,2)) , ( IF(AND(ISBLANK(Base_de_Calculo__c),ISBLANK(Tasas__c)), UnitPrice ,IF( ISBLANK(Base_de_Calculo__c),UnitPrice * (1- IF( ISBLANK(Tasas__c), 0, Tasas__c/100)),(UnitPrice * (1- IF( ISBLANK(Tasas__c), 0, Tasas__c/100)) +(UnitPrice * IF( ISBLANK(Tasas__c), 0, Tasas__c/100) * (1 - Base_de_Calculo__c/100 ))))) * VALUE(PricebookEntry.Product2.CANTIDAD_SUB_UNIDAD__c) ))
CustomField.label: Pre√ßo Liquido
